meanings.definition: A stringed musical instrument resembling a lute or guitar.
meanings.sent1: She learned to play beautiful melodies on the cithren.
meanings.sent2: The musician strummed the cithren gently, filling the room with music.
meanings.sent3: During the concert, the cithren suddenly started playing on its own!
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the cithren strings like a skilled artist.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cithren echoed through the halls, enchanting all who listened.

meanings.sent1: He would cithren every evening, bringing joy to his listeners.
meanings.sent2: She cithrened a lively tune that made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to cithren along with the music, pawing at invisible strings.
meanings.sent4: His heart cithrened with happiness as he played his favorite song.
meanings.sent5: The music flowed from his fingers as he cithrened, filling the air with harmony.
